topic_reasoning_zh: 四张图片包含海岸（海鸥、海浪、日落）与河流景观，主题为展示多样自然美景。
topic_reasoning_en: The four images include coastal (seagulls, waves, sunset) and river scenes, displaying diverse natural beauties.

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示海滩海浪海鸥等自然美景，符合主题
images.reasoning_en: Picture shows beach, waves, seagulls—natural scenery relevant to theme

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示河流、山体等多样自然美景，直接相关主题
images.reasoning_en: Image shows diverse natural scenery like river and mountain, directly related

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示海滩海浪飞鸟等自然美景，与主题强相关
images.reasoning_en: Image shows beach, waves, birds—direct natural scenery display, strongly related

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示海边日落美景，属于自然美景范畴
images.reasoning_en: The picture shows seaside sunset scenery, a type of natural beauty
